## load library
library(knitr)

load("/work-zfs/abattle4/parsana/networks_correction/publication_figures/fig3/fig3.RData")
library("pracma")
library(dplyr)

compute.auprc <- function(x,y){
	# x = filter(dat)$recall
	# y = filter(dat)$precision
	naid <- which(is.na(y))
	if(length(naid) > 0){
		x = x[-naid]
		y = y[-naid]
	}
	id <- order(x)
	auprc <- trapz(x[id],y[id])
	auprc
}

plot.sub %>%
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarize(test = compute.auprc(recall, precision))

plot.lung %>%
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarize(test = compute.auprc(recall, precision))

plot.thyroid %>%
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarize(test = compute.auprc(recall, precision))

plot.muscle %>%
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarize(test = compute.auprc(recall, precision))

plot.blood %>%
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarize(test = compute.auprc(recall, precision))
